nodes.title: Model links (for local user)
widgets_values:
Guide: [Subgraph](https://docs.comfy.org/interface/features/subgraph)

## Report issue

If you found any issues when running this workflow, [report template issue here](https://github.com/Comfy-Org/workflow_templates/issues)

## Model links

[Comfy-Org/Ovis-Image](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Ovis-Image)

## gguf Model links

**text_encoders**

- [ovis_2.5.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Ovis-Image/resolve/main/split_files/text_encoders/ovis_2.5.safetensors)

**diffusion_models**

- [ovis_image_bf16.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Ovis-Image/resolve/main/split_files/diffusion_models/ovis_image_bf16.safetensors)

**vae**

- [ae.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/z_image_turbo/resolve/main/split_files/vae/ae.safetensors)

A commercial advertisement poster for a lemon-lime sparkling soda. A glass bottle with a green cap is center frame, surrounded by exploding water splashes, ice cubes, and fresh lemon slices. Large, bold, 3D typography at the top reads "FEEL THE FIZZ". Floating text on the left says "Zero Sugar" in a green badge. Text at the bottom right reads "Ultimate Refreshment". High saturation, studio lighting, hyper-realistic, 4k resolution.

A dynamic product photography of a sleek blue energy drink can. Electric lightning bolts and blue liquid swirls surround the can. The background is a deep purple gradient. Huge, slanted, aggressive typography across the center reads "MAX POWER". Smaller glowing text below says "Instant Energy Boost". A yellow circular sticker text says "100% Charged". Cyberpunk aesthetic, intense contrast, professional advertising layout.

Sophisticated serif typography floating in the air reads "Eternal Scent". Smaller, delicate text underneath says "Essence of Rose". At the bottom, minimalist text reads "Paris Collection". Soft pastel colors, dreamy atmosphere, high fashion style.
